name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ニコニコ動画 Link Opener
name.ja: ニコニコ動画リンクオープナー

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to open ニコニコ動画's ID link or search videos quicker.
short.ja: シンプルなニコニコ動画の動画のIDから動画を見るエクステンション。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NicoNico Douga Link Opener
---
This extension helps a NicoNico Douga fan to open an unlinked NicoNico Douga video by its ID quickly. It also can search NicoNico Douga video by inputting a keyword.

Context menu is also provided as the shortcut to the extension's features.

Updated to manifest v2
